article:
Soon it would be the holidays, but before that, there were final exams. All the children were working hard, reviewing their _ . If they didn't pass the exams, they would have to take them in September. There were usually a few students who _ , but Cathy didn't want to be one of them. She worked hard all year, but she worked so hard that her mother was worried about her. She went to bed too late. The night before the big day, her mother asked her to go to bed early and take a sleeping pill. She said she would _ her up in the morning.
Cathy was too _ to fall asleep. She kept thinking about the exams. At last, the _ did work. Soon, she was sitting in the exam room, looking at the paper, but she couldn't answer _ of the questions. Everyone around her was writing pages and pages. She thought hard, _ she couldn't do anything. From time to time, she looked at her _ 
Time was nearly running _ . There was only an hour to leave. She started one page, but it was too hard, she gave up and tried another one. With only half an hour left , she wrote two sentences. By this time she was so worried that she started _ . Her whole body shook.It shook so much that she woke up. She was still in bed and it was just a terrible _ . A minute later, her _ called her name.
